title: Undergraduate Topics in Mathematics I
description:
This topics module is intended as an elective module for
strong and motivated students specialising in
mathematics. The topics for the module will be chosen
from a fundamental area of mathematics and may change
from year to year. Besides regular lectures, each student
will do independent study, give presentations and submit a
term paper. There will be opportunities in the course for
the students to conduct individual or group research on the
topics discussed.
